markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=52)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Whether for coin, glory, or justice, you know how to track, defeat, and capture dangerous individuals. You're accustomed to perusing wanted posters, searching up on leads, and pursuing villains to hell and back.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
